column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bato says : " Ice dodging is a ceremonial test of wisdom , bravery , and trust .
#Text=" Bato says : " You 'll be dodging those .
#Text=Sokka , you steer and call the shots , lead wisely .
#Text=Katara , you secure the main sail .
#Text=The winds can be brutal , so be brave .
#Text=Aang , you control the jib .
#Text=Without your steady hand , we all go down .
#Text=Your position is about trust .
#Text=" Aang says : " I know that .
#Text=Why would n't I know that ?
#Text=I 'm the Avatar ; I know about trust .
#Text=" Bato says : " For this is to be done right , I can not help .
#Text=You pass or fail on your own .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Aang , ease up on the jib .
#Text=Katara , steady .
#Text=Aang , less sail .
#Text=Katara , give him room .
#Text=Aang , helm to lee .
#Text=Helm to lee !
#Text=" Aang says : " What does that even mean ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Great job !
#Text=" Katara says : " There 's no way through !
#Text=" Sokka says : " We can make it .
#Text=" Bato says : " Sokka , you 've already proven yourself .
#Text=Maybe we should - " Sokka says : " Aang , I 'm gon na need air in that sail .
#Text=Katara , I want you to bend as much water as you can between us and those rocks .
#Text=Now !
#Text=" Bato says : " The spirits of water bear witness to these marks .
#Text=For Sokka , the Mark of the Wise .
#Text=The same mark your father earned .
#Text=For Katara , the Mark of the Brave .
#Text=Your courage inspires us .
#Text=And for Aang , the Mark of the Trusted .
#Text=You are now an honorary member of the Water Tribe .
#Text=" Aang says : " I ca n't .
#Text=" Katara says : " Of course you can !
#Text=" Aang says : " No , you ca n't trust me .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , what are you talking about ?
#Text=" Aang says : " A messenger gave this to me for Bato .
#Text=You have to understand .
#Text=I was afraid you would - " Sokka says : " This is the map to our father !
#Text=You had it the whole time ?
#Text=How could you ?
#Text=Well , you can go to the North Pole on your own .
#Text=I 'm going to find Dad .
#Text=" Bato says : " Well , Sokka .
#Text=I think you should - " Sokka says : " Katara , are you with me ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm with you Sokka .
#Text=" Katara says : " Good luck .
#Text=" Aang says : " Okay .
#Text=You too .
#Text=" Aang says : " Guess I should be moving on .
#Text=" Mother Superior says : " That would be best .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm an idiot , Momo .
#Text="
